keepConnect.name: Hlala
keepConnect.helperText: Uma uchafata kusixhumanisi se-Start, bese ugcina lesixhumanisi. Loku kudzinga kunakwa kutsi lesixhumanisi sitawuphindze sixhumeka njalo ngemuva kwekutsi sincibilike.
